reviewText: This Dvd contains a story written by Chip Davis. The story is performed on ice by skaters. The music of Mannheim Steamroller is absolutely magnificent when choreographed with the skating sequences. That is what makes this a work of art.It seems a lot like a Christmas fairy tale on ice! It has spectacular music and some beautiful special effects.Truly Unique and yet "another" masterpiece from the artful hands of Chip Davis.So, if you like ice skating and the music of Mannheim Steamroller, then this is the DVD for you!Just keep in mind that this is not a concert, but a well-put-together Christmas show.It is 45 mins. of magic. The story is told by Chip Davis and Olivia Newton John, as parents reading a book to their children. This DVD stars Dorothy Hamill and Elvis Stojko.This is a beautiful story for parents and children alike, and will probably be a very enjoyable experience for you!Chip Davis is the genius behind Mannheim Steamroller and is the "main man" behind this production! ENJOY!
summary: Chip Davis Is A Musical Genius!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Mannheim Steamroller - The Christmas Angel: A Story on Ice. This is a excellent DVD of a Christmas story told by Chip Davis and Olivia Newton-John. It has music and ice skating to portray the story. My 5 year old grandson loves this so much that we had to buy a second DVD because he has warn the first one out. The story is an old tradition story with great effects and can be enjoyed by the whole family.
summary: Mannheim Steamroller - The Christmas Angel: A Story on Ice
Title: N/A

reviewText: I hold the place of unfortunate viewer who stumbled across this steaming pile of crap while perusing channels around Christmas last year.  To my amazement, a slew of Christmas-themed costumed characters skated in random directions like roaches scattering after a light is flipped on.  Not only was I frozen in disbelief as this sad excuse for a Christmas special rolled on, but was actually unable to move to turn the channel.  Seeing the hypnotizing part that I did of this terrible production has remained a macabre plight burned into my brain.  Luckily, I was able to somehow move my hand to the control and eventually turn the channel after the shock and disbelief that something like this would be aired on television wore off.  If I could give this movie a negative star rating I would.  Not enjoying this production has nothing to do with the lack of Christmas spirit; the blazingly horrible choreography and random characters from all facets of Christmas rolled into one scene would be too much for anyone I know to stomach.  I definitely agree with Chef.  This is just one of those Christmas specials that networks use to take up air time so that they can go home and enjoy a real Christmas with their families, sans this bag of crap.
Title: N/A

reviewText: While my family is a BIG fan of Mannheim Steamroller and of figure skating and also think the character lineup and story line and choreography of this production is great, the production quality of this DVD is absolutely pathetic. There are 3 areas on this disc that break up so badly, as if there was a bad rainstorm while watching satellite TV, that we thought that the disc itself was flawed. We complained to Amazon and they kindly gave is a free return label and immediately sent us another new DVD. Well, the new DVD was identical in every flawed detail to the first one. The producers and marketers of this DVD have a lot to learn about quality control and customer satisfaction. I am following up this review with an attempt to contact the producers and get them to do the right thing but it will probably be a fruitless task. We are just thankful to Amazon for their efforts in trying to correct bad product concern.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Thoroughly enjoyable DVD. I have long followed the skaters and skating shows. So I am familiar with the cast of this show. The addition of Mannheim Steamroller music adds to its uniqueness. I bought a sample of this DVD last year and decided I must have the complete show. Well executed wih a cute story line. Randy Gardner's choreography is amazing.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Have been a fan of the versatile Mannheim Steamroller for years, and bought this on that basis. Was not prepared for a highly professional staging of what could have been a boring storyline.Elvis Stojko, Dorothy Hamel and Rudy Galindo, as the leads, are well known for their excellent skating talents, but they showed great acting ability as well. the quality of the supporting cast was excellent. The costuming, sets and special effects were absolutely top-notch for its time, and better than some of the modern productions. I was very sorry I did not know about this when it came out originally, but the joy of sorting through Amazon is the jewels I find, and this is one.I didn't see the point of the introduction with Olivia Newton-John, unless it was to add unnecessary "star-attraction." It interfered with the continuity of the skating production. Other than that, this is a keeper!Mannheim Steamroller - The Christmas Angel: A Story on Ice [VHS]
summary: A lovely winter tale on ice.
Title: N/A
